summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel B) will convene on May 22, 2024, for a briefing at 10:00 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, with an option for participation via videoconference. The primary purpose is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. Key topics involve reviewing uncontested cases and individual cases that require board decisions.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals on the docket include requests for special exceptions to fence height regulations and visibility obstruction regulations at multiple properties. Notable cases include:
- BDA234-060(BT) at 2323 N. Carroll Avenue, seeking multiple special exceptions.
- BDA234-062(CJ) at 10576 Shiloh Road, requesting special exceptions for fence height and standards.
- BDA234-068(CJ) at 6919 Oriole Drive, requesting a variance for front-yard setbacks and a special exception for fence height.

**Action Items**:  
The Board will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will deliberate on the various applications presented. Decisions will be made regarding the approval of special exceptions and variances as outlined in the case docket. Public testimony will also be considered before final decisions are rendered.
